titleStmt.title: The armies remembrancer. Wherein they are presented with a sight of their sinnes and dangers. And also with a Scripture expedient for their preservation. / By a cordiall friend to the kingdomes welfare, Rr.
titleStmt.author: Rr.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 4th 1648". The 9 in 1649 has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
